resources.string:
Hi, my name is Farhan. 

I love Juventus. 

I am started watching football match on television when I was 8 years old. 

My favorite football player is Gianluigi Buffon. 

For me, he is a goalkeeper, a leader, a great sports man, and a superman. 

I have never watched a live football match. 
Umm, by the way I love Japanese culture. 

When I have a free time, I watched anime and listen Japanese pop. 

I like One Piece and Gintama so much. 

I hope someday I can visit Italy or Japan to watch a football match.
